Arena rockers Korn return to the intimate Hammerstein Ballroom to launch their new record "See You On The Other Side" for a group of their closest fans. Live On The Other Side brings you an up-front all-access pass to Korn from the first chord to the closing bow and much more. Shot in High Definition and recorded in Digital Surround Sound Korn Live On The Other Side delivers the Korn event of a lifetime into your own living room.System Requirements:Running Time 130 Mins.Format: DVD AUDIO Genre: MUSIC DVD/CONCERTS Rating: R UPC: 855153001189 Manufacturer No: 00118-9
